textarea:
{{Navbox | name = Elon Musk | title = [[Elon Musk]] | image = [[File:Elon Musk 2015.jpg|80px]] | state = {{{state<includeonly>|collapsed</includeonly>}}} | listclass = hlist
| group1 = Companies | list1 = * [[Zip2]] (1995–1999) * [[X.com]] (1999–2000, later [[PayPal]]) * [[SpaceX]] (2002–present) * [[Tesla, Inc.]] (2004–present) * [[SolarCity]] (2006–present) * [[OpenAI]] (2015–present) * [[Neuralink]] (2016–present) * [[The Boring Company]] (2016–present)
| group2 = Other endeavors | list2 = * [[Hyperloop]] * [[Elon Musk's Tesla Roadster|Tesla Roadster in space]] * [[Boring Test Tunnel]]
| group3 = Family | list3 = * [[Maye Musk]] (mother) * [[Justine Musk]] (first wife) * [[Talulah Riley]] (second wife) * [[Grimes (musician)|Grimes]] (current girlfriend) * [[Kimbal Musk]] (brother) * [[Tosca Musk]] (sister) * [[Lyndon Rive]] (cousin)
| group4 = In culture | list4 = * ''[[Elon Musk: Tesla, SpaceX, and the Quest for a Fantastic Future]]'' (2015 biography) * "[[The Musk Who Fell to Earth]]" (''The Simpsons'', 2015) * "[[One Crew over the Crewcoo's Morty]]" (''Rick and Morty'', 2019)
| group5 =Legacy | list5 = * [[List of awards and honors received by Elon Musk|Awards and honors]]
|below= {{icon|Category}} [[:Category:Elon Musk|Category]] }}<noinclude> [[Category:People and person navigational boxes|Musk, Elon]] </noinclude>
